description: Calibration pass: FSR CLA recalibration (127 models), sector CLA deflation (87 models in 4 sectors), 2026 T-score boosts (Education 32, Government 23, Mining 19, Transportation 42), OPP boosts (Retail 36, Agriculture 19), 4 new Arts/Entertainment models

overscoring.FSR_CLA_RECALIBRATION: ARCH_DEFAULTS for full_service_replacement reduced (6,6,6,7) to (4,4,5,5). Manual override avg 42.8 vs old heuristic avg 63.5. 127 heuristic-scored FSR models recalculated.
overscoring.SECTOR_CLA_DEFLATION: 4 sectors with inflated CLA: Real Estate (1,0,0,1) to (0,0,0,1), Education (1,1,0,0) to (0,0,0,0), Other Services (1,1,0,0) to (0,0,0,0), Wholesale (1,1,0,1) to (0,0,0,0). 87 heuristic models adjusted.

underscoring.EDUCATION_T_BOOST: SN +1.0, FA +0.5, EC +0.5 for 32 NAICS-61 models. Evidence: enrollment cliff Fall 2025, 80+ closures, $10B/yr AI investment.
underscoring.GOVERNMENT_T_BOOST: SN +1.0, EC +1.0, TG +0.5 for 23 NAICS-92 models. Evidence: 82% CIO adopted AI, Pentagon AI strategy, $50B federal IT/quarter.
underscoring.RETAIL_OPP_BOOST: MO +0.5, MA +0.5, DV +1.0 for 36 NAICS-44/45 models. Evidence: AI-retail 46.5% CAGR, 87-94% positive revenue impact.
underscoring.MINING_T_BOOST: SN +1.0, TG +0.5, CE +0.5 for 19 NAICS-21 models. Evidence: BHP/Rio Tinto autonomous ops at production scale.
underscoring.AGRICULTURE_OPP_BOOST: MO +1.0, MA +0.5, DV +1.0 for 19 NAICS-11 models. Evidence: precision ag VC funding +71%, John Deere autonomy.
underscoring.TRANSPORTATION_TG_BOOST: TG +1.5 for 42 NAICS-48/49 models. Evidence: Aurora commercial revenue, Serve robotics 1000+ robots, Waymo 150K+ rides/week.

new_models.MC-V54-AICONT-001: AI Content Generation Studio Platform — T=84.5, CLA=79.5, VCR=82.8, GM=82.2 (#3 triple actionable)
new_models.MC-V54-GAMEA-001: AI-Native Game Development Engine — T=77.5, CLA=71.5, VCR=74.8
